components.name: storm-core
components.description: Core storm daemons and APIs including trident

fields.description:
Error in consumeBatchToCursor method after few days or running. Error occurred on bolt's ack method call.

Linked Issue: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/STORM-770

 
{code:java}
